description: This Java source file defines the IPCMessage class, which handles encoding and decoding IPC request and reply messages, including payload management and stream processing.

classes.name: IPCMessage
classes.description: A class to encode and decode IPC request and reply messages, managing message codes and payloads for inter-process communication.

methods.name: decodeRequest
methods.description: Decodes a request message from an InputStream.

methods.name: decodeReply
methods.description: Decodes a reply message from an InputStream.

methods.name: getMessageCode
methods.description: Returns the message code for a request.

methods.name: setMessageCode
methods.description: Sets the message code for a request.

methods.name: getReturnCode
methods.description: Returns the return code for a reply.

methods.name: setReturnCode
methods.description: Sets the return code for a reply.

methods.name: encodeRequest
methods.description: Encodes the request message to an OutputStream.

methods.name: encodeReply
methods.description: Encodes the reply message to an OutputStream.
